definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

sentences.english: Simons. Everything of African-American heritage has been torn down.
sentences.chinese: 所有的非裔美国人遗产都被拆除了。

sentences.english: He is, in fact, the nation's first African-American president.
sentences.chinese: 他，实际上，是这个国家第一名非裔的总统。

sentences.english: African Americans, notes Keith, are disproportionally affected by risk factors for cardiovascular disease.
sentences.chinese: 凯斯说，非裔美国人特别容易得心血管疾病。

sentences.english: The crisis of masculinity was portrayed as particularly sever within African American communities.
sentences.chinese: 男子气概危机被认为在美籍非裔团体中尤其严重。

sentences.english: MONTAGNE: So more so than whites, African Americans get on the internet through cell phones.
sentences.chinese: 所以比起白人来，更多的非裔美国人通过手机上网。

sentences.english: African Americans were more susceptible than whites, as were sedentary people compared to those who were physically active.
sentences.chinese: 非裔美国人多于白人，久坐者多于经常锻炼者。
他是冈比亚人，一个非裔基督徒。

sentences.english: The murder of the civil rights leader led to fiery riots in African-American neighborhoods in many cities.
sentences.chinese: 对于民权领袖的谋杀引起了许多城市非裔社区的骚乱。

sentences.english: and we are a black, Afro-American heavy metal group.
sentences.chinese: 我们是一个由非裔美国黑人组成的重金属乐队。

sentences.english: African Americans are twice as likely as Caucasians to suffer from coronary disease.
sentences.chinese: 非裔美国人的冠心病的几率是白种人的两倍。

sentences.english: The fade haircut is a popular choice among African American men.
sentences.chinese: 高平头是在非裔美国人中比较流行的一种发型。

sentences.english: He's born African-American in the States.
sentences.chinese: 他是生在美国的非裔美国人。

sentences.english: Landrieu replace Ray Nagin who mixed blood African-American.
sentences.chinese: 兰德鲁取代雷纳金混血的非裔美国人。

sentences.english: Norton, an African-American, was bitter toward whites.
sentences.chinese: 一个非裔美国人，对白人有苦毒。

sentences.english: Myers, Gerald. " African Americans and the Modern Dance Aesthetic. " American Dance Festival.
sentences.chinese: 非裔美人与现代舞美学＞，美国舞蹈节。

definition: ethnic Chinese/non-Chinese citizen of Chinese ancestry
Queens, one of the five boroughs of New York City
The Bronx, borough of New York City/Bronx County (coextensive with The Bronx)/also written 布朗士
The Bronx, borough of New York City/Bronx County (coextensive with The Bronx)/also written 布朗克斯
